title: How to Download Demos from the PlayStation Store

steps.headline: Turn on your console.
steps.description: To do so, you can either press the "On" button in the front of the console, or press the PS button on a connected controller.

steps.headline: Select your profile and press X.
steps.description: Doing this logs you into your PlayStation 4.

steps.headline: Select PlayStation Store and press X.
steps.description: It's one tab left of the home page.

steps.headline: Scroll down to select Games and press X.
steps.description: You'll do so in menu bar on the left side of the screen.

steps.headline: Select Demos and press X.
steps.description: It's an option on the left side of the screen.

steps.headline: Select a demo you'd like to download and press X.
steps.description: Any games listed on this page have a free demo available.

steps.headline: Select Try Free Demo and press X.
steps.description: This option is below the game's icon on the left side of the screen. Once you press X, your selected demo will begin downloading. Once the demo finishes downloading, it will be available from the home page as well as your PS4's game library.

steps.headline: Turn on your PlayStation 3.
steps.description: You can do this by pressing the console's "On" switch or by pressing a connected controller's PS button.

steps.headline: Select a profile and press X.
steps.description: This will sign you into your PlayStation 3's home page.

steps.headline: Scroll down to select PlayStation Store and press X.
steps.description: This will open the PlayStation store.

steps.headline: Scroll down to select Games and press X.
steps.description: You'll do so in menu bar on the left side of the screen.

steps.headline: Select Demos and press X.
steps.description: This option is on the left side of the screen.

steps.headline: Select a game you'd like to try and press X.
steps.description: You can download a free demo for any game listed on this page.

steps.headline: Select Try Free Demo and press X.
steps.description: This option is below the game's icon on the left side of the screen. Once you press X, your selected demo will begin downloading. Once the demo finishes downloading, it will be available in your PS3's game library.

steps.headline: Go to the PlayStation Store website.
steps.description: It's located at https://store.playstation.com/.

steps.headline: Click the Games tab.
steps.description: This option is near the top of the page, just right of the "PlayStation Store" logo. If you aren't logged into your PlayStation Network on this computer, first click Sign In in the top-right corner of the page and enter your account email address and password.

steps.headline: Scroll down and click All Demos By Title.
steps.description: It's on the left side of the page beneath the "Demos" heading. Doing so will open a list of all available demos on the PlayStation Network.

steps.headline: Click a demo you'd like to try.
steps.description: This will take you to the demo's page, where you can use screenshots and reviews to determine for yourself whether or not you want to download it. To sort demos by device, scroll down and click your PlayStation's box (e.g., PS3 or PS4) beneath the "Device" heading on the left side of the page.

steps.headline: Click Try Free Demo.
steps.description: It's just below your selected game's icon.

steps.headline: Click Confirm Purchase.
steps.description: This option is on the right side of the page. You're not paying for this demo, of course--this is just to confirm that you want to download it to your PS3 or PS4.

steps.headline: Click Download to your PS#.
steps.description: This option is in the bottom-right side of the page under the "Your New Content" heading. Clicking this button will prompt the demo to begin downloading to your PS3 or PS4. If your PlayStation is on and you're signed into your PSN account on it, you'll see a notification window pop up on your TV alerting you that the download has started. If your PlayStation is in Rest Mode, your download will still commence.
